mainMenuWelcome: Welcome! How may we assist you?
invalidEmail:
Invalid email. Try again:
Example: name@example.com
noServices: No services available. Try later or contact support.
noSlotsInMonth: No slots in {month}. Choose another month.
noSlotsAvailable: No slots available. Choose another date.
bookingCancelled: Booking cancelled. Start again from main menu.
bookingFailed: Booking failed. Try again or contact support.
helpText:
How to Book:

1. Select 'Book Appointment'
2. Choose service
3. Select doctor (if needed)
4. Pick date & time
5. Enter details
6. Confirm

Need help? Contact support.
supportText:
Customer Support

We're here to help!

Reply with your query or contact us directly.

Response time: 24 hours (business days)

Thank you!
